verses.verse: And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Gird <S%H2296>up<s%> thy <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6378>box<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to Ramoth-gilead: <S%H7433><s%>

And when thou <S%H935>comest<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> look <S%H7200>out<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi,<s%> and go <S%H935>in,<s%> and make him arise <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H935>carry<s%> him to an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>chamber;<s%>

Then <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6378>box<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Then <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H2442>tarry<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
So the young <S%H5288>man,<s%> even the young <S%H5288>man<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead.<s%>

And when he <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have an <S%H1697>errand<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee, O <S%H8269>captain.<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H413>Unto<s%> <S%H4310>which<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> us? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H413>To<s%> thee, O <S%H8269>captain.<s%>

And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and he <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> thy <S%H113>master,<s%> that I may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>

For the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> shall <S%H6>perish:<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> him that <S%H8366>pisseth<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and him that is shut <S%H6113>up<s%> and <S%H5800>left<s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Ahijah: <S%H281><s%>

And the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> in the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and there shall be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> her. And he <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

Then <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of his <S%H113>lord:<s%> and one <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Is all <S%H7965>well?<s%> <S%H4069>wherefore<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7696>mad<s%> fellow <S%H413>to<s%> thee? And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> his <S%H7879>communication.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H8267>false;<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> us <S%H4994>now.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>Thus<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> he <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then they <S%H4116>hasted,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> him <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H1634>top<s%> of the <S%H4609>stairs,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> is <S%H4427>king.<s%>

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%> (Now <S%H3141>Joram<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria.<s%>

But <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4347>wounds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H761>Syrians<s%> had <S%H5221>given<s%> him, when he <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria.)<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> it <S%H3426>be<s%> your <S%H5315>minds,<s%> then let <S%H408>none<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> nor <S%H6412>escape<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> it in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> rode in a <S%H7392>chariot,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3141>Joram<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%>

And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and he <S%H7200>spied<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8229>company<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H8229>company.<s%> And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H7395>horseman,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> them, and let him <S%H559>say,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace?<s%>

So there <S%H1980>went<s%> one on <S%H7392>horseback<s%> <S%H5483><s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace?<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou to do with <S%H7965>peace?<s%> <S%H5437>turn<s%> thee <S%H413>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> me. And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>told,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H1992>them,<s%> but he cometh not <S%H7725>again.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>

Then he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> on <S%H7392>horseback,<s%> <S%H5483><s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> them, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace?<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou to do with <S%H7965>peace?<s%> <S%H5437>turn<s%> thee <S%H413>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> me.

And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>told,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, and cometh not <S%H7725>again:<s%> <S%H3808><s%> and the <S%H4491>driving<s%> is like the <S%H4491>driving<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H5090>driveth<s%> <S%H7697>furiously.<s%>

And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Make <S%H631>ready.<s%> And his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> was made <S%H631>ready.<s%> And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7122>against<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and <S%H4672>met<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is it <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> so long <S%H5704>as<s%> the <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> and her <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> are so <S%H7227>many?<s%>

And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> There is <S%H4820>treachery,<s%> O <S%H274>Ahaziah.<s%>

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> drew a <S%H7198>bow<s%> with his <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H3027>strength,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H2220>arms,<s%> and the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at his <S%H4480>heart,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> and he sunk <S%H3766>down<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> Jehu <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H920>Bidkar<s%> his <S%H7991>captain,<s%> Take <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him in the <S%H2513>portion<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> how that, when <S%H589>I<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H6776>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him;

Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H570>yesterday<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will <S%H7999>requite<s%> thee in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2513>plat,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5375>take<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H2513>plat<s%> of ground, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But when <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> this, he <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5221>Smite<s%> him <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H4818>chariot.<s%> And they did so at the going <S%H4608>up<s%> to <S%H1483>Gur,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H854>by<s%> <S%H2991>Ibleam.<s%> And he <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> carried him in a <S%H7392>chariot<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his <S%H6900>sepulcher<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3141>Joram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> began <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And when <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it; and she <S%H7760>painted<s%> <S%H6320><s%> her <S%H5869>face,<s%> and <S%H3190>tired<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and looked <S%H8259>out<s%> <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window.<s%>
And as <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> entered <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> Had <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> who <S%H2026>slew<s%> his <S%H113>master?<s%>

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is on my <S%H854>side?<s%> <S%H4310>who?<s%> And there looked <S%H8259>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5631>eunuchs.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Throw her <S%H8058>down.<s%> So they threw her <S%H8058>down:<s%> and some of her <S%H4480>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%> was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H5483>horses:<s%> and he trod her under <S%H7429>foot.<s%>

And when he was come <S%H935>in,<s%> he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Go, <S%H6485>see<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H779>cursed<s%> woman, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> her: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is a <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> her: but they <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H3808>more<s%> of her <S%H3588>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1538>skull,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Wherefore they came <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> shall <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of Jezebel: <S%H348><s%>
